    MaliciousVisitor​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act()
    Update the Malicious visitor movement if it is near the circe House, it will set isStelaing() true, and increase the stealing count which represents the time for stealing If isRunning() is true and the isStealing() is false, it will do following actions: if the circe is nearby, it will run away from circe if the circe is not nearby, it will directed toward the circe house
    void beginRunning()
    set the Malicious visitor running state true
    int destinationDir​(int[] destination)
    It would guide what direction should be go to reach the destination If the destination is diagnoal direction from the malicious visitor, it would move the bigger distances
    void draw​(DrawingSurface g)
    The MaliciousVisitor will be drawn by Creature.java draw method Additionally, it will update the the some private values inside the malicious visitor
    int getStealingCount()  
    java.lang.String getType()  
    boolean isRunning()  
    boolean isStealing()  
    void stealMessage​(DrawingSurface g)
    It will draw the "Yay I Stole!" on top of the head
    void stopRunning()
    set the Malicious visitor running state false

  • Constructor Details

    • MaliciousVisitor

      public MaliciousVisitor​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y)
      Initilize the Malicious visitor other values are setted as a default that shown in Creature.java constructors and visitor.java constructor
      Parameters:
      img - the visitor image
      x - x coordinate of the visitor
      y - y coordinate of the visitor

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Overrides:
      getType in class Visitor
      Returns:
      the type of this class ("Malicious")

    • act

      public void act()
      Update the Malicious visitor movement if it is near the circe House, it will set isStelaing() true, and increase the stealing count which represents the time for stealing If isRunning() is true and the isStealing() is false, it will do following actions: if the circe is nearby, it will run away from circe if the circe is not nearby, it will directed toward the circe house
      Overrides:
      act in class Visitor

    • stopRunning

      public void stopRunning()
      set the Malicious visitor running state false

    • beginRunning

      public void beginRunning()
      set the Malicious visitor running state true

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns:
      the wheter it is running or not (true if it is running false otherwise)

    • getStealingCount

      public int getStealingCount()
      Returns:
      the stealing count which represents the how many time taken for stealing

    • destinationDir

      public int destinationDir​(int[] destination)
      It would guide what direction should be go to reach the destination If the destination is diagnoal direction from the malicious visitor, it would move the bigger distances
      Overrides:
      destinationDir in class Creature
      Parameters:
      destination - the grid coordinate for the destination
      Returns:
      the direction to reach the destination

    • isStealing

      public boolean isStealing()
      Returns:
      true if the malicious visitor is currently stealing something. false otherwise

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface g)
      The MaliciousVisitor will be drawn by Creature.java draw method Additionally, it will update the the some private values inside the malicious visitor
      Overrides:
      draw in class Creature
      Parameters:
      g - Drawing surface object that the creature will be drawn on
      Precondition:
      Drawing Surface has to be not the null

    • stealMessage

      public void stealMessage​(DrawingSurface g)
      It will draw the "Yay I Stole!" on top of the head
      Parameters:
      g - Drawing Surface object that the message will be drawn on
      Postcondition:
      g.fill() will be setted to 170, 10, 10
